title: Engine Identification, Engine Number

steps.text: The engine identification is engraved on the flattened part of the oil filter housing (arrow II). Note: When installing a short–block engine, the engine number should be stamped onto the base plate of the cylinder block (arrow I) before installing the engine.

notes:
The engine identification is engraved on the flattened part of
the oil filter housing (arrow II).
 When installing a
short–block engine, the engine number should be stamped onto
the base plate of the cylinder block (arrow I) before installing
the engine.
